title: Login Issues
body: Hey, is anyone else having login issues? Can't seem to be able to log in for a few days now. I'm with Vodafone.

replies.body: tryed everything have the same problem, struggling. have no idea what to do :(

I know it seems like a hassle but if that's the case I would try repairing the client or reinstalling it.

I haven't heard of any of my friends have that issue either
